sentence in indonesian using the words: Instruksi itu sangat penting untuk dipatuhi.
english translation: "Those instructions are crucial to be followed."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Kami mengadakan pameran seni internasional tahun depan.
english translation: "We are organizing an international art exhibition next year."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Isi buku tersebut sangat menarik dan informatif.
english translation: "The content of the book is captivating and informative."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Perayaan tahun baru akan diadakan di tempat istimewa ini.
english translation: "The New Year's celebration will be held at this special place."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Apakah kamu melihat itu?
english translation: "Did you see that?"

sentence in indonesian using the words: Saya perlu meminta izin kepada bos untuk cuti besok.
english translation: "I need to ask for a permit from my boss for tomorrow's leave."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Aku bekerja keras, jadi aku akan mendapatkan hasilnya.
english translation: "I am working hard, so I will get the results."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Dia adalah penjahat yang berbahaya.
english translation: "He is a dangerous evil-doer."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Tolong tunjukkan jalan keluar yang terdekat.
english translation: "Please show the nearest way out."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Patuhi jalur lalu lintas ketika mengemudi.
english translation: "Observe the traffic lanes while driving."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Jam berapa acara mulai?
english translation: "What time does the event start?"

sentence in indonesian using the words: Toko ini memiliki jam buka yang panjang.
english translation: "This store has long opening hours."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Jamu tradisional ini bisa menyembuhkan sakit kepala.
english translation: "This traditional herbal medicine can cure a headache."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Dia adalah seorang janda yang kuat.
english translation: "She is a strong widow."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Jangan lupa mengunci pintu ketika pergi.
english translation: "Don't forget to lock the door when you leave."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Jangan lupa mengucapkan terima kasih.
english translation: "Don't forget to say thank you."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Haruslah kita bertemu lagi, aku berjanji.
english translation: "We must meet again, I promise."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Hati-hati, ini bisa membuat jantungmu berdebar.
english translation: "Be careful, this can make your heart race."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Burung ini merupakan spesies yang jarang ditemui.
english translation: "This bird is a rare species."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Aku melihatnya menunjuk dengan jari telunjuknya.
english translation: "I saw him pointing with his index finger."
